mapper.select: select lt.* from room_info ri left join room_lease_term rlt on ri.id=rlt.room_id and rlt.is_deleted=0 left join lease_term lt on rlt.lease_term_id=lt.id and lt.is_deleted=0 where ri.id=2 and ri.is_deleted=0;
select lt.id,lt.month_count,lt.unit from room_lease_term rlt left join lease_term lt on rlt.lease_term_id=lt.id and lt.is_deleted=0 where rlt.is_deleted=0 and rlt.room_id=#{id};
